description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Create a galaxy, colonize it's planets, and unleash the forces of gravity and fire in order to protect your civilization from extra-terrestrial attack!  With 10 campaign levels, and literally hundreds of unique possible scenarios in sandbox mode - see how much space-strategy-awesomeness you can handle!
